title: Is beatrice Dead!!!
body: since swains new update ive heard nothing of beatrice his pet (does this mean shes dead now)

replies.body: why did they rework swain into lucious malfoy. that's what i want to know

Hmmmm Badass spell-slinging Death eater, one of the stronger and most feared wizards, and master of the dark arts...
Or badly dressed cripple with a bird fixation?

Well if I was swain, I know which one id pick. :P
maybe swain is dead and the guy you see now is Beatrice {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Swain used to be Dr House, now he's just another pleeb.

>Let’s just say we didn’t murder Beatrice… we made Beatrice a murder.

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/2018/01/champ-insights-swain/

Hard to be dead when you never existed _(remember that reworks in terms of lore aren't an evolution of a champ, but rather a:  "Ohhh btw the old swain didn't exist, yea he's always been like this.")_


But yes she does still exist as one of his ravens as shown by his joke: _"Now which one of you is Beatrice again?"_

So yes, Beatrice is living still.
